SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: All requirements emphasize the need for customizable privacy settings that allow users to control the sharing of personal information and health data.
SimilarGroups.DifferenceNote: While the first two focus on functionality, the last one specifies the need for clear explanations in accessible language.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Customizable Privacy Settings with Accessibility
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall provide users with customizable privacy settings that enable them to control what personal information and health data are shared with caregivers and how it is utilized, with clear explanations provided in accessible language.

SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: These requirements address the necessity for compliance with data privacy regulations and the security of user data.
SimilarGroups.DifferenceNote: The first and second requirements focus on healthcare regulations, while the latter two emphasize user control and user trust aspects.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Comprehensive Data Privacy and Security Compliance
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall ensure that all user data is securely stored and processed in compliance with relevant data privacy regulations, providing users with control over their personal information and fostering their trust.

Conflicts.Note: The first requirement emphasizes user control over personal information, while the second allows compliance settings to override user preferences, leading to a conflict between user autonomy and regulatory adherence.
